Name: Stun
Description: <value> equipment is disabled this turn
Script: When inflicted: var goodeq = []; for(eq in self.equipment){ if(eq.availablethisturn){ goodeq.push(eq); }; }; goodeq = shuffle(goodeq); var s = getstatusself(~Stun~); while(goodeq.length > 0 && s > 0){ s-=1; var r = goodeq.pop(); r.availablethisturn = false; r.unavailabledetails = [~Stunned~]; r.animate(~flashandshake~); }; sfx(~_shock~);
Script: On Start Turn: var goodeq = []; for(eq in self.equipment){ if(eq.availablethisturn){ goodeq.push(eq); }; }; goodeq = shuffle(goodeq); var s = getstatusself(~Stun~); while(goodeq.length > 0 && s > 0){ s-=1; var r = goodeq.pop(); r.availablethisturn = false; r.unavailabledetails = [~Stunned~]; r.animate(~flashandshake~); }; sfx(~_shock~);

Name: Demise
Description: Take 1 damage every second this turn
Script: On Start Turn: self.resetvar(~Demise~); var s = new elements.Skill(~Against all odds_old~); s.script = ~if(self.dicepool.length == 0 # self.doendturnnow # self.hp == 0) { self.getvar(\~Demise\~).stop(); } else { pierceattackself(1); sfxdamage(self[;] 1); }~; var act = new motion.actuators.SimpleActuator(null[;] 1[;] null); act._repeat = -1; self.setvar(~Demise~[;] act); act.onRepeat(s.execute[;] [self[;]target]); act.move();
Script: End Turn: var s = new elements.Skill(~Against all odds_old~); s.script=~removestatusself(\~Demise\~[;] 1);~; var tw = new motion.actuators.SimpleActuator(null[;]0.01[;]null); tw.onComplete(s.execute[;][self[;]target]); tw.move(); if(self.varexists(~Demise~)) { self.getvar(~Demise~).stop(); self.resetvar(~Demise~); }

Name: heater
Description: Weaken all equipment with [ice] symbol.
Script: On Start Turn: var eqtoweaken = []; for (eq in self.equipment){ if(eq.availablethisturn && eq.fulldescription.indexOf(~[ice]~) != -1 && !eq.hastag(~weakenavoid~) && !eq.hastag(~weakenimmune~)){ eqtoweaken.push(eq); } } for(eq in eqtoweaken) eq.animate(WEAKEN);

Name: heater+
Description: Weaken all cyan equipment.
Script: On Start Turn: var eqtoweaken = []; for (eq in self.equipment){ if(eq.availablethisturn && eq.equipmentcol == 8 && !eq.hastag(~weakenavoid~) && !eq.hastag(~weakenimmune~)){ eqtoweaken.push(eq); } } for(eq in eqtoweaken) eq.animate(WEAKEN);

Name: never6
Description: You can't roll 6 this fight.
Script: When inflicted: var dicerange = []; if(self.isplayer)  dicerange = Rules.actualplayerdicerange.copy(); else  dicerange = Rules.actualenemydicerange.copy(); if(dicerange.length == 0) { dicerange = [1|2|3|4|5|6]; } dicerange.remove(6); if(dicerange.length == 0) { dicerange = [1]; } if(self.isplayer)  Rules.playerdicerange(dicerange); else  Rules.enemydicerange(dicerange);

Name: commandment
Description: (should not appear)
Script: When inflicted: var forbiddendice = rand([[~odd dice~| [1|3|5]]|[~even dice~| [2|4|6]]|[~1s~|[1]]|[~2s~|[2]]|[~3s~|[3]]|[~4s~|[4]]|[~5s~|[5]]|[~6s~|[6]]]); var penalty = rand([[~lose [heart]5 health~|function() attackself(5)]|[~lose [heart]10 health~|function() attackself(10)]|[~enemy gains [fury]Fury~|function() inflict(FURY)]]); status.template = null; status.description = [~If you use ~ + forbiddendice[0] + ~| ~ + penalty[0]]; self.setvar(~forbiddendice~| forbiddendice[1]); self.setvar(~commandpenalty~| penalty[1]); /*Shock release only works in the 1.12 alpha.*/ if (status.scriptonshockrelease != null) status.scriptonshockrelease = ~for (d in self.dicepool) if (d.consumed && self.getvar(\~forbiddendice\~).indexOf(d.basevalue) != -1) {self.getvar(\~commandpenalty\~)(); removestatusself(\~Commandment\~); break;}~
Script: On any equipment use: for (d in e.assigneddice) if (d != null && self.getvar(~forbiddendice~).indexOf(d.basevalue) != -1) {var s = new elements.Skill(~Against all odds_old~); s.script = ~self.getvar(\~commandpenalty\~)(); removestatusself(\~Commandment\~)~; var tw = new motion.actuators.SimpleActuator(null|0.01); tw.onComplete(s.execute|[self|target]); tw.move(); break;}
